name: svelte-tweakpane-ui-docs
description: Documentation website for Svelte Tweakpane UI.

scripts.build:02-astro: pnpm run sync && pnpm run check && astro build && tsx ./scripts/generate-version-json.ts > ./dist/svelte-tweakpane-ui/version.json
scripts.validate-links: pnpx linkinator http://localhost:4321/svelte-tweakpane-ui --recurse --verbosity error --retry-errors-count 2 --retry-errors true --retry true --concurrency 1 --timeout 10000 --retry-errors-jitter 50 --skip www.linkedin.com
scripts.validate-links-live: pnpx linkinator https://kitschpatrol.com/svelte-tweakpane-ui --recurse --verbosity error --retry-errors-count 2 --retry-errors true --retry true --concurrency 1 --timeout 10000 --retry-errors-jitter 50  --skip www.linkedin.com
